description: This header file declares functions related to monitoring and managing the health status of a Zigbee network, including starting/stopping health checks and setting problem states.

methods.name: zigbeeHealthCheckStart
methods.description: Starts monitoring the Zigbee network for health status.

methods.name: zigbeeHealthCheckStop
methods.description: Stops monitoring the Zigbee network for health status.

methods.name: zigbeeHealthCheckSetProblem
methods.description: Sets the network health problem state (presence or absence of problems).
